name: Shadows on the Delta
description:
Can you and your cellmate escape Mississippi's toughest prison? To make it to the green fields of freedom, you'll need to use your reflexes, your patience, and most of all, your teammate! If either of you are captured by the prison's many speedy guards, you'll have to restart the level. (This is a challenging game!)

This game was created as a project for an NYU Game Development course.

Roles: Level Designer and Builder, Programmer (C#). I worked in a team of four students, who also contributed to this game's programming, art, and music.

Type: Unity 2D Cooperative Stealth computer game .
